description: Smallest prime p such that Q(sqrt -p) has class number 2n +1.
mathematica: Note that all such primes are == (3 mod 4) << NumberTheory`NumberTheoryFunctions` a = Table[0, {101}]; Do[ c = ClassNumber[ -Prime[n] ]; If[ c < 102 && a[ [c] ] == 0, a[ [c] ] = Prime[n] ], {n, 2, 4000} ]; Table[ a[ [n] ], {n, 1, 101} ]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Apr 17 2001
